value.title: Differences between Power BI Apps and Workspaces
value.excerpt: In today's video I am going to show you the difference between Power Bi Apps and workspaces and what do I use them for. I also explain why I think that workspaces are too messy for the business user or data consumer.  Links to resources mentioned in the video: The new App Navigation video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3Bo0HHUcuas

value.title: Fill down and replace null/blank values in Power Query
value.excerpt: In this video I will show you how to troubleshoot fill down and replace blank values.  If you are trying to fill down blank values or replace null values you might see that power query ignores it completely. In this video I will show you how to fix this issues. value.title: Managing changing column names in Power Query #10: (M)agic (M)ondays
value.excerpt: In today's video, I will show how to manage column headers that changes names so your power bi file does not break when you refresh it.  This tip is from Lars Schreiber and here is the link to his blog post and how to do this in power query: http://power-bi-usergroup.blogspot.se/2015/12/dealing-with-tables-with-changing.html

value.title: Power BI URL Filter Updates (August 2018)
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick looks at the recent updates to using the Power BI URL Filter. The update to using URL Filter parameters in Power BI include updates to operators along with the ability to use more than strings and spaces in table names!   Blog: https://powerbi.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/power-bi-report-url-filter-improvements/
